lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic says he wants to win gold at the Olympics in Rio de Janeiro and will not be staying at the athletes' village during the games.

headline.print_headline: Novak Djokovic Won't Stay in Village for Rio Olympics
headline.main: Novak Djokovic Won't Stay in Village for Rio Olympics
